DOC.detailed_description: Background Aim : Basal cell carcinoma ( BCC ) common skin cancer .Photodynamic therapy _as novel , non-invasive therapeutic approach _may consider valuable strategy . This study design aim evaluation efficacy PDT treatment BCC factor may affect response rate . Materials Methods : This clinical trial do 28 BCCs . Patients treat ALA-PDT monthly 1-6 session evaluate clinical response , cosmetic result probable side effect .
